short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension implements XKCD 1288 for great justice.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Substitutions make reading the news more fun! Like 'spaaace' for 'space' and 'Pokedex' for 'smartphone'.

For the full list, see http://xkcd.com/1288/
